original_text:
He reigned for three years in Jerusalem. His mother's name was Micaiah the daughter of Uriel of Gibeah.
Now there was war between Abijah and Jeroboam.
korean_text: 예루살렘에서 삼 년 동안 다스리니라 그의 어머니의 이름은 미가야요 기브아 사람 우리엘의 딸이더라 아비야가 여로보암과 더불어 싸울새

sentences.original_text: He reigned for three years in Jerusalem.
Micaiah was the daughter of Uriel of Gibeah.
Now there was war between Abijah and Jeroboam.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 아비야와 여로보암 사이에 전쟁이 있었습니다.
